name: Inter-Frequency Load Balancing
summary: This feature manages the uneven distribution of traffic load between different

parameters.name: UeMeasControl.sMeasure
parameters.description: Serving cell RSRP threshold controlling whether the UE is                                     required to perform                                     measurements  The parameter                                     should                                     be disabled in cells where load balancing is applied.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeDetectTime
parameters.description: The attribute can be used to configure uplink-heavy UE                                     detection.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrThresh
parameters.description: The attribute can be used to configure uplink-heavy UE                                     detection.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrHyst
parameters.description: The attribute can be used to configure uplink-heavy UE                                     detection.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.iflbAbEnabled
parameters.description: If the EUtranCellFDD.iflbAbEnabled or the                                         EUtranCellTDD.iflbAbEnabled parameter is                                     set to true, the                                     Inter-Fequency                                     Load Balancing feature is enabled during access  class                                     barring.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.iflbAbEnabled
parameters.description: If the EUtranCellFDD.iflbAbEnabled or the                                         EUtranCellTDD.iflbAbEnabled parameter is                                     set to true, the                                     Inter-Fequency                                     Load Balancing feature is enabled during access  class                                     barring.

parameters.name: loadBalancingAllowed
parameters.description: Member of the FreqPrioEUTRA struct. The parameter                                     references from the RATFreqPrio MO.  If the RFPM function of Subscriber Triggered Mobility is             activated and the UE has a SPID value associated with it, the inter-frequency load             balancing is inhibited for that UE. It is inhibited only when the                 loadBalancingAllowed attribute related to the concerned                 RATFreqPrio MO for the concerned target carrier frequency is set             to false.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbUlHeavyUeDetectEnabled
parameters.description: The attribute can be used to enable uplink-heavy UE detection for                                     load-balancing mobility actions.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.lbUlHeavyUeDetectEnabled
parameters.description: The attribute can be used to enable uplink-heavy UE detection for                                     load-balancing mobility actions.

parameters.name: PtmFunction.ptmEnabled
parameters.description: This                                     parameter is used to enable and configure the Preferential                                     Traffic Management solution. With appropriate configuration,                                     inter-frequency load balancing can be stopped for some cell                                     relations to priority cells with high traffic load from                                     non-prioritized cells. For more information, see Preferential Traffic Management                                         Guidelines.

parameters.name: PtmIflbConfig.stopIncomingIflbThreshold
parameters.description: This                                     parameter is used to enable and configure the Preferential                                     Traffic Management solution. With appropriate configuration,                                     inter-frequency load balancing can be stopped for some cell                                     relations to priority cells with high traffic load from                                     non-prioritized cells. For more information, see Preferential Traffic Management                                         Guidelines.

parameters.name: PtmCellProfile.cellType
parameters.description: This                                     parameter is used to enable and configure the Preferential                                     Traffic Management solution. With appropriate configuration,                                     inter-frequency load balancing can be stopped for some cell                                     relations to priority cells with high traffic load from                                     non-prioritized cells. For more information, see Preferential Traffic Management                                         Guidelines.

parameters.name: PtmIflbConfig.stopOutgoingIflbEnabled
parameters.description: This                                     parameter is used to enable and configure the Preferential                                     Traffic Management solution. With appropriate configuration,                                     inter-frequency load balancing can be stopped for some cell                                     relations to priority cells with high traffic load from                                     non-prioritized cells. For more information, see Preferential Traffic Management                                         Guidelines.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_SUB_RATIO
parameters.description: Average subscription ratio for a cell during a load reporting                                     period. Default time is 15                                     sec.

parameters.name: X2_PRIVATE_MESSAGE
parameters.type: ASN.1 encoded content is part of the                                         pmEventHeader
parameters.description: X2 messages used to subscribe and exchange load information                                     between RBSs.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: CGI of target cell that participates in load balancing if it is                                     available.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Load                                     difference                                     (in subscription ratio) between source and                                     neighbor cells.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Unsigned integer value of                                         EVENT_PARAM_LB_DIFF. The value can be                                     positive or negative.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Load balancing amount                                     (in                                     subscription quanta) to be moved from source                                     to target cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Subscription ratio of                                     source                                     cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Subscription ratio of                                     target                                     cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Rate offset applied to offset the load balancing towards a cell                                     with higher capacity, if the general traffic load level is                                     low.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_LB_INTER_FREQ
parameters.description: Unsigned integer value of                                         EVENT_PARAM_LB_RATE_OFFSET. The value                                     can be positive or negative.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Target                                     frequency

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Indicates the function that has triggered the UE measurement.  Can be one of the following:    Load Balancing     Carrier Aggregation Triggered Redirection (CATR)     Best Neighbor Relation (BNR) for Load Balancing     Admission-Triggered Offload (ATO)

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Indicates                                     whether                                     or not the UE selected for load balancing                                     related measurements is CA-capable.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: CGI of neighbor target cells for which UEs fulfilled A5 measurement                                     criteria.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Number of UEs checked and discarded before choosing this UE for                                     load balancing related measurements.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: CGI of neighbor target cells for which UEs fulfilled A5 measurement                                     criteria.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the RAT of the source for incoming handover and for                                     target for outgoing handover cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the reason for not proceeding with a load balancing                                     (LB) or CATR when a measurement report has been received from                                     the                                     UE                                     :    CA criteria not met      Reported cell is not a valid load balancing target     Reported cell is a valid target, but lbAmount is already                                             satisfied for the cell      Service Specific Load Management (SSLM) related                                             restrictions     RSRQ of target cell is lower than configured                                             threshold     UE                                             has                                             signalled interest in Multimedia                                             Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS) on serving                                             frequency     UE                                             has                                             signalled interest in Multimedia                                             Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS) and UE is MBMS on                                             SCell capable ( mbms-SCell-r11 = 1, 3GPP 36.331)      UE has an ongoing Voice over IP (VoIP) call and does not                                             support Single Radio Voice Call Continuity (SRVCC)     Admission-Triggered Offload (ATO) related                                             restrictions

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the function that has triggered the UE measurement.  Can be one of the following:    Load Balancing     CATR     BNR for Load Balancing     Admission-Triggered Offload (ATO)

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_X2_OUT
parameters.description: The cause of the procedure for HO Execution.     Circuit Switched (CS)     Carrier Aggregation (CA)     Service or Priority-triggered Inter-Frequency Handover                                             (SPIFHO)     Admission-Triggered Offload (ATO)

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
parameters.description: The cause of the procedure for HO Execution.     Circuit Switched (CS)     Carrier Aggregation (CA)     Service or Priority-triggered Inter-Frequency Handover                                             (SPIFHO)     Admission-Triggered Offload (ATO)

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_MOBILITY_EVAL
parameters.description: Indicates the trigger for performing a mobility evaluation.    Circuit Switched (CS)     Carrier Aggregation (CA)     Service or Priority-triggered Inter-Frequency Handover                                             (SPIFHO)     Admission-Triggered Offload                                             (ATO                                             )

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_PTM_CELL_RESERVED_START
events.type: Triggered when the load is above threshold or the S1-C                                         connection to the priority PLMN is recovered. It indicates                                         that the cell is reserved for operator use.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_PTM_CELL_RESERVED_STOP
events.type: Triggered when the load is below threshold or the S1-C                                         connection to the priority PLMN failed. It indicates that                                         the cell is no longer reserved for operator use.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_PTM_CELL_RESERVED_SUSP_START
events.type: Triggered when the load is above threshold or the S1-C                                         connection to the priority PLMN failed. It indicates that                                         the cell reservation for operator use is suspended.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_PTM_CELL_RESERVED_SUSP_STOP
events.type: Triggered when the load is below threshold or the S1-C                                         connection to the priority PLMN is recovered. It indicates                                         that the suspension of cell reservation for operator use is                                         over.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011319 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011319 MO instance.
